page.title: 17HORBURY PEOPLE'S HOLIDAYS
page.content: BLACKPOOL:Blackpool is a popular resort on the Lancashire coast.Most people go there for the amusement arcades,shows and cicuses.I like the amusement arcades because they have all the latast space-invader video games. People usually stay in hotels or boarding houses.Some people prefer to take their caravans or tents and stay on one of the campsites. When I went to Blackpool with my family we stayed in a hotel.Ireally liked our hotel.In the morning you had a choice of cornflakes or orange juice to start breakfast,followed by bacon and eggs.They even gave you grilled bacon if you wanted it. I enjoyed going to the Pleasure Beach where there were lots of exciting rides.We also hired fishing tackle from a shop on the pier.
